    Function reference

    All functions

    Delta_vars
    Difference variables
    add_arrows()
    Add arrow descriptions to a paths data frame
    add_budget_line()
    Add a budget line to a data frame of budget lines
    add_indifference_curve()
    Add an indifference curve to a data frame
    add_iso()
    Add an iso line description to a data frame
    add_segment()
    Add a line segment to a data frame
    bar_vars
    EEU bar data
    calc_Deltas()
    Calculate differences between stages
    calc_bar()
    Calculate energy rebound data at the bar stage
    calc_hat()
    Calculate energy rebound data at the hat stage
    calc_orig()
    Calculate energy rebound data at the original stage
    calc_rebound()
    Calculate rebound terms.
    calc_star()
    Calculate energy rebound data at the star stage
    calc_tilde()
    Calculate energy rebound data at the tilde stage
    calibrate_k()
    Calibrate values for macro parameter k
    consumption_paths()
    A data frame of consumption paths
    eeu_base_params
    EEU base parameters
    eeu_data_table
    EEU data table metadata
    energy_paths()
    A data frame of energy rebound paths
    expenditure_paths()
    A data frame of expenditure path segments
    extract_meta()
    Extract a metadata data frame from rebound data
    extract_points()
    Extract points from a data frame of paths
    geom_seq()
    Generate a geometric sequence
    graph_df_colnames
    Names of graph data frame columns
    graph_types
    Plane types
    hat_vars
    EEU hat data
    indifference_func()
    An indifference curve
    indifference_lines()
    Indifference curve lines
    iso_budget_lines_cons()
    Create iso-budget (expenditure) lines for a consumption path graph
    iso_energy_lines()
    Iso-energy lines for energy rebound path graphs
    iso_expenditure_lines()
    Create a data frame of iso-expenditure lines
    key_analysis_vars
    Key analysis variables
    latex_key_analysis_vars
    LaTeX key analysis variables
    latex_rebound_stages
    LaTeX rebound stages
    latex_rebound_terms
    LaTeX version of rebound terms
    load_eeu_data()
    Load EEU data from a sheet in an Excel workbook
    orig_vars
    EEU orig data
    parametric_analysis()
    Run parametric analyses
    parametric_analysis_point_types
    Parametric analysis point types
    path_graph_params
    Path graph parameters
    path_graphs()
    Create rebound path graphs
    rebound_analysis()
    Perform a complete rebound analysis
    rebound_graphs_helper()
    Create path maps for rebound analysis
    rebound_results_table()
    Build a rebound results table
    rebound_segments
    Rebound segment names
    rebound_stages
    Rebound stages
    rebound_terms
    Rebound terms
    rebound_terms_agg
    Aggregate rebound terms
    rebound_terms_graph()
    A sensitivity graph containing all rebound terms
    rebound_units
    Information for rebound units
    rebound_var_units()
    Units for variables
    sample_eeu_data_path()
    Path to sample EEU data
    sens_graph_params
    Sensitivity graph parameters
    sensitivity_graphs()
    Sensitivity graphs for rebound analyses
    stages_table()
    Build a stages table
    star_vars
    EEU star data
    tilde_vars
    EEU tilde data
